title: Automotive Service Systems and Expansive Learning Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of automotive structures and interest in service-oriented professions
context.additional_context: Strengthening smartphone-based collaborative learning activities and service system simulation through role-playing

learning_goals: Learners identify at least three components of an automotive service system.
Learners collaborate with team members to analyze service system issues and propose improvement strategies.
The process of change in service systems can be explained using Cultural-Historical Activity Theory.
Service improvement project deliverables can be produced using smartphone tools (e.g., note-taking, photo capture).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
